rules.title: Initial Greeting
rules.action: Agent provides standard greeting, identifies clinic, and offers assistance.
rules.example: Hello, thank you for calling [Clinic Name], this is [Agent Name]. How may I help you today?

rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.condition: Patient requests to schedule an appointment
rules.action: Agent asks if the patient is new or an existing patient.
rules.example: Are you a new patient with us, or have you visited us before?

rules.title: Inquire About Appointment Scope
rules.condition: Patient requests to schedule an appointment
rules.action: Agent asks if the appointment is for the caller only or also for family members.
rules.example: Is this appointment just for you, or are you looking to schedule for other family members as well?

rules.title: Verify Family Member Status
rules.condition: Patient indicates appointment is for a family member
rules.action: Agent inquires about the family member's patient status (new or established).
rules.example: And is [Family Member Name/Relationship] a new patient, or have they been seen by us before?

rules.title: Ascertain Visit Reason
rules.action: Agent asks about the purpose or reason for the patient's visit.
rules.example: What is the reason for your visit today?

rules.title: Inquire About Insurance Use
rules.condition: Patient is scheduling an appointment (primarily for the caller)
rules.action: Agent asks if the patient plans to use dental insurance.
rules.example: Will you be using dental insurance for this appointment?

rules.title: Inquire About Patient's Insurance (for non-caller)
rules.condition: The appointment is for a patient who is not the caller (e.g., a family member or other designated individual).
rules.action: The agent asks if the identified patient plans to use dental insurance for their appointment.
rules.example: And for [Patient's Name/Relationship], will they be using dental insurance for their visit today?

rules.title: Collect Insurance Details
rules.condition: Patient indicates they will use dental insurance
rules.action: Agent asks for the insurance company name and plan type (e.g., PPO, HMO).
rules.example: Could you please tell me your insurance company's name and the type of plan you have, like PPO or HMO?

rules.title: Clarify Insurance Details
rules.condition: Patient provides unclear or incomplete insurance information
rules.action: Agent asks clarifying questions to confirm insurance details.
rules.example: I apologize, could you spell out the insurance company name for me? Or could you clarify the plan type?

rules.title: Verify Network Status
rules.action: Agent checks if the office is in-network with the provided insurance plan.
rules.example: Let me quickly check if we are in-network with your [Insurance Company Name] [Plan Type] plan.

rules.title: Handle Confusion
rules.condition: Customer expresses confusion or asks for repetition
rules.action: Agent repeats or rephrases information to ensure understanding.
rules.example: I apologize, let me rephrase that. I was asking if you are a new patient with our clinic.
